name: HexaGo (Jknapp)
description:
HexaGo is my first solo game jam game! 

This is an endless runner/platformer.  You'll have to utilize short and long hops to progress (tap or hold space). To shift to lateral platforms you can use the arrow keys or A\D.  You do not have to jump when shifting platforms as long as they are next to each other. 

Music: "All in at Night" by Bastion Slice - EpidemicSound.com
